QuestData.Title: Teach A Man To Fish.... Or Steal
QuestData.Description: Rustberg Village. That place is a curse and a blessing for us, $n. I have no clue where bandits learned to fish as well as they do but I have no time to worry about that now.$B$BI need you to head down there and steal as many of their fish reserves as possible. We have been living off scraps since we retook the island and this is our best chance at some solid food reserves.$B$BKeep an eye out for stealthers up there, reports have told us they are prevalent inside the village walls.
QuestData.LogDescription: You must steal 22 Rustberg Seabass from Rustberg Village. The fish can be found on string stands at the docks, round back of the village. Rustberg Village is due north of base camp, on the right side.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you able to pull off the heist and get us some fish?
